author: BabyCenter Guest Blogger
title: 6 surefire tips for making your pre-baby body look like it's back
text:
by BabyCenter Guest Blogger posted in Parenting By Jill Simonian I remember first time pregnancy well: the unexpectedness, the panic, the big F-bomb I dropped as a way of breaking the news to my husband (because of said unexpectedness and panic). I freaked. Once I absorbed the truth of that little pink plus sign, I... Read more Â»
